channel.title: Wilderness
channel.description:
I think there should be an area called Wilderness where it's PVP. It's seriously horrible. I just go to spawn, and I got instant killed by reyx
And to prevent noobs from going in, hitting some1, running out, make it so once you go in, you have to wait 10 seconds to leave.

item.title: Wilderness
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

Canownueazy:

I killed a guy with lava and he’s flaming mad now lawl

I carry a sword flint and steel and some lava incase I get attacked but I don’t attack random people

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:1, topic:377909”]Canownueazy, There is not one main point of the game. If you dont like the pvp just dont play. Simple…[/quote]Yes it is. If the point of the game was strictly for PvP, the game wouldn’t be called Minecraft. The main objective stated by Notch wouldn’t be to kill skeletons. Most importantly, the combat wouldn’t be boring as hell.

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:

I killed a guy with lava and he’s flaming mad now lawl

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:7, topic:377898”][quote author=Spades link=topic=473781.msg3464386#msg3464386 date=1294784604]
You guys can make a command to teleport you to a place and make that area pvp, then make the rest of the map non pvp.
[/quote]yah

the point of the game is building[/quote]

It’s more like an old world.
We scavenge for resources. We build. We become a community.
Some are different though. They don’t have time for that. Instead, they make deals, they make alliances.
And they kill who gets in their way. There is no currency, just some resources worth more than others.
Those have to come from somewhere, right? Someone will have to mine them up. But for every person mines something up, there is the person who kill them.

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

I wasn’t camping, I spawned on the intention of killing the first person I saw. It was more you camping than me. I saw, I slashed, I robbed. And I don’t target people or grief, I just get my kill and take the money. If you’re poor, you’re of no use.

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness

Sorry i agree with Canownueasy, i don’t think pvp should be everywhere, or at least disable it at spawn?

item.title: Wilderness
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:2, topic:377898”]Or… not.[/quote]It’s horrendous. People just standing at spawn waiting for people, people raiding all over. That is NOT the point of Minecraft. PVP was a test feature. Minecraft is to build cool stuff and fight against monsters with friends, not make enemies

I lost all my stuff because reyx camped at spawn and killed me when I got there. My chest was somehow stolen even though it was protected (not password protected btw, real protection)? (Happened to loads of other people)

Read full topic
